enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve handling incoming data and updating the state of the PseudoTCPBase instance.
The accept method also involves waiting for data and updating the state, similar to onTcpReadable.
Both methods notify the availability of data or buffer space, which can inform assertions about the state of the PseudoTCPBase instance.
Both methods handle state changes and exceptions, which can inform assertions about the handling of errors and state transitions.
